com.tinfoilsms.crypto

Class ECGKeyUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinfoilsms.crypto.ECGKeyUtil

  • public abstract class ECGKeyUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A helpful key utility class which contains utility operations which are used when performing an Elliptic Curve Gillett (ECG) Exchange. It provide key exchange utility operations for encoding and decoding Elliptic Curve keys.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ECGKeyUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPrivateKeyParameters decodeBase64PriKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, byte[] encodedPriKey)
      decodeBase64PriKey A function wrapper function for decodePriKey which takes a base64 encoded ECC private key parameter object and returns an ECPrivateKeyParameters object for the private key D BigInteger value.
      static org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters decodeBase64PubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, byte[] encodedPubKey)
      decodeBase64PubKey A wrapper function for decodePubKey which takes an ASN.1 encoded ECC public key Q that was then encoded as base64 and returns an ECPublicKeyParameters object for the public key Q.
      org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters decodeBase64SignedPubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, org.spongycastle.crypto.Digest digest, byte[] signedPubKey)
      decodeBase64SignedPubKey A wrapper function for decodeSignedPubKey which takes an ASN.1 encoded ECC public key Q that is signed using the Elliptic Curve Gillett (ECG) Exchange key exchange and that was then encoded as base64 and returns an ECPublicKeyParameters object for the public key Q.
      org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPrivateKeyParameters decodePriKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, byte[] encodedPriKey)
      decodePriKey A function which takes an ECC private key parameter object and returns an ECPrivateKeyParameters object for the private key D BigInteger value.
      static org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters decodePubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, byte[] encodedPubKey)
      decodePubKey A function which takes an ASN.1 encoded ECC public key Q and returns an ECPublicKeyParameters object for the public key Q.
      org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters decodeSignedPubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, org.spongycastle.crypto.Digest digest, byte[] signedPubKey)
      decodeSignedPubKey A function which takes an ASN.1 encoded ECC public key Q that is signed using the Elliptic Curve Gillett (ECG) Exchange key exchange and returns an ECPublicKeyParameters object for the public key Q.
      static byte[] encodeBase64PriKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, org.spongycastle.crypto.CipherParameters priKey)
      encodeBase64PriKey A function which takes an ECC private key parameter object and returns the private key D BigInteger value that is encoded as base64 for proper storage and transmission in textual form.
      static byte[] encodeBase64PubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, org.spongycastle.crypto.CipherParameters pubKey)
      encodeBase64PubKey A wrapper function for encodePubKey() which takes an ECC public key parameter object and returns the ASN.1 encoded X and Y values for the public key Q that is then encoded in base64 encoding for proper storage and transmission in textual form.
      static byte[] encodePubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam, org.spongycastle.crypto.CipherParameters pubKey)
      encodePubKey A function which takes an ECC public key parameter object and returns the ASN.1 encoded X and Y values for the public key Q.

    • Method Detail

      • encodePubKey

        public static byte[] encodePubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam,
                  org.spongycastle.crypto.CipherParameters pubKey)
                           throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        encodePubKey A function which takes an ECC public key parameter object and returns the ASN.1 encoded X and Y values for the public key Q.
        Parameters:
        keyParam - The Elliptic Curve key parameter which contains the curve specifications and domain parameters
        pubKey - an ECC public key parameter which implements CipherParameters
        Returns:
        A byte array of the ASN.1 encoded public key Q
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException

      • encodeBase64PubKey

        public static byte[] encodeBase64PubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam,
                        org.spongycastle.crypto.CipherParameters pubKey)
                                 throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        encodeBase64PubKey A wrapper function for encodePubKey() which takes an ECC public key parameter object and returns the ASN.1 encoded X and Y values for the public key Q that is then encoded in base64 encoding for proper storage and transmission in textual form. This may be needed to transmit/store the ASN.1 encoded public key properly.
        Parameters:
        keyParam - The Elliptic Curve key parameter which contains the curve specifications and domain parameters
        pubKey - an ECC public key parameter which implements CipherParameters
        Returns:
        A byte array of the ASN.1 encoded public key Q
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException

      • encodeBase64PriKey

        public static byte[] encodeBase64PriKey(ECKeyParam keyParam,
                        org.spongycastle.crypto.CipherParameters priKey)
                                 throws java.security.InvalidParameterException
        encodeBase64PriKey A function which takes an ECC private key parameter object and returns the private key D BigInteger value that is encoded as base64 for proper storage and transmission in textual form.
        Parameters:
        keyParam - The Elliptic Curve key parameter which contains the curve specifications and domain parameters
        priKey - an ECC private key parameter object which implements CipherParameters
        Returns:
        A byte array of the base64 encoded private key D BigInteger value
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidParameterException

        encodedPubkey - A byte array of the ASN.1 encoded public key Q

      • decodeSignedPubKey

        public org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters decodeSignedPubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam,
                                                                      org.spongycastle.crypto.Digest digest,
                                                                      byte[] signedPubKey)
        decodeSignedPubKey A function which takes an ASN.1 encoded ECC public key Q that is signed using the Elliptic Curve Gillett (ECG) Exchange key exchange and returns an ECPublicKeyParameters object for the public key Q.
        Parameters:
        keyParam - The Elliptic Curve key parameter which contains the curve specifications and domain parameters
        digest - The digest function used to originally sign the key such as SHA256
        signedPubkey - A byte array of the ASN.1 encoded public key Q that is signed
        Returns:
        An ECC public key parameter for Q, ECPublicKeyParametersimplements

      • decodeBase64SignedPubKey

        public org.spongycastle.crypto.params.ECPublicKeyParameters decodeBase64SignedPubKey(ECKeyParam keyParam,
                                                                            org.spongycastle.crypto.Digest digest,
                                                                            byte[] signedPubKey)
        decodeBase64SignedPubKey A wrapper function for decodeSignedPubKey which takes an ASN.1 encoded ECC public key Q that is signed using the Elliptic Curve Gillett (ECG) Exchange key exchange and that was then encoded as base64 and returns an ECPublicKeyParameters object for the public key Q.
        Parameters:
        keyParam - The Elliptic Curve key parameter which contains the curve specifications and domain parameters
        digest - The digest function used to originally sign the key such as SHA256
        signedPubkey - A byte array of the ASN.1 encoded public key Q that is signed
        Returns:
        An ECC public key parameter for Q, ECPublicKeyParametersimplements

        decodePriKey A function which takes an ECC private key parameter object and returns an ECPrivateKeyParameters object for the private key D BigInteger value.
        Parameters:
        keyParam - The Elliptic Curve key parameter which contains the curve specifications and domain parameters
        priKey - a byte array of the private key D BigInteger value
        Returns:
        an ECPrivateKeyParameters object for the private key D BigInteger value
